sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.
sentences.chinese: 轴承允许传动轴转动的同时允许壳体保持静止。

sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.
sentences.chinese: 轴承允许传动轴转动的同时允许壳体保持静止。

sentences.english: The people who allowed torture have faced no punishment at all.
sentences.chinese: 而那些允许酷刑的人却不会受到任何处罚。

sentences.english: They never allowed the government to develop trains.
sentences.chinese: 它们绝不允许政府开发铁路。

sentences.english: Allow at least three hours between dinner and bedtime.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐和睡觉之间至少允许有三个小时。

sentences.english: This allows you to change the emoticon theme that should be used.
sentences.chinese: 这将允许您变更要使用的笑脸主题。

sentences.english: Tell me, Monsieur Thenardier, is what we have done permissible?
sentences.chinese: 我们干的这种事，德纳第先生，你说说，是允许的吗？

sentences.english: The ampersand (&) characters between the sibling element subpatterns indicate that any order is acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟元素子范式之间的竖线表示允许任何顺序。

sentences.english: Clear glass cover allows observation of interior mechanism to aid in setting and checkout.
sentences.chinese: 透明玻璃盖允许观察内部机制，以帮助确定和检验。
我们的良知不允许如此。

sentences.english: Helper classes allow you to add functionality to your test scripts.
sentences.chinese: 助手类允许您将功能添加到您的测试脚本中。

sentences.english: De Roquefort allowed the fool a victory.
sentences.chinese: 雷孟达允许这个白痴一点小小的胜利。

sentences.english: This patient is not allowed visitors.
sentences.chinese: 这个病人是不允许探视的。

sentences.english: Mentors are not to repair robots or be involved in programming of students' robots.
sentences.chinese: 不允许教練修復机械人或是參与编写程序。

sentences.english: Intraenous fluid repletion allows oral fluids to be offered sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 允许口服液体补充静脉体液量。

definition: only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
